title: Can't hear the far off adhan properly, how to answer it to gain the reward? #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: when I hear the aan I want to repeat after it but sometimes this comes from so far that I barely hear murmurs what should I do should I repeat it just in my mind and for that reward of intercession on behalf hopefully if you hearb and you know that this isbar not Salah for example you repeat behind that and you try to follow to the best of your ability whatever you hear and repeat it that you will get the reward fully
